article: the chief u.s. envoy at north korean nuclear negotiations met for several hours tuesday with his north korean counterpart in germany , but no date was settled to resume talks meant to rid the north of its nuclear weapons , the state department said .
abstract: u.s. and north korea envoys meet in germany can not settle resumption date
